name: Ornamental
description:
A daily puzzle game for the Playdate.

Decorate a christmas tree with various festive ornaments. Line them up to rack up massive combos and earn points.

You get three tries every day to get a high score on the Daily Puzzle, and you can hone your skills in the dedicated Free Play mode.

Controls
  • Use the D-Pad to move the ornament.
  • Use the crank to rotate the ornament.
  • Press the A button to place the ornament.
